name: Squrim
description:
Winter is coming, and you're forced to live a squirrel life with desire to find some nuts!

Gameplay description:

  1. Find the largest possible nuts
  2. Bring them to your home
  3. ???
  4. Profit!

How to play:

  1. wads - movement
  2. Space - jump
  3. E - use
  4. Number 1 and 2 - toggle inventory
  5. Right mouse - AIM with item
  6. Left mouse - throw an item
